event.name: Screening for Emerson students: Senseless Smoke Film Screening & Youth Talkback
event.shortDescription: On February 24th at 6pm, we are teaming up with the Elma Lewis Center to host a screening of Senseless Smoke

description.html: Senseless Smoke, Teen Empowermentâ€™s original film based on the lived experience of Boston youth, created, performed, directed, produced, and soundtrack by TE youth and adult staff. This screening is geared toward Emerson students and will include a discussion facilitated by T.E. youth.
